price: [Allah said], “Stamp [the ground] with your foot: here is a cool spring for bathing and drinking.”
arabic: ٱرۡكُضۡ بِرِجۡلِكَۖ هَٰذَا مُغۡتَسَلُۢ بَارِدٞ وَشَرَابٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
